segments.text: It's heartbreaking to see the dangers no one notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s so intent on her chore, missing the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water’s spilling everywhere, soaking the floor sadly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot’s in it, and she might slip without warning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s balanced so precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he’ll tumble down hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits eagerly, unaware of the risk too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re just kids wanting cookies, but it’s risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets getting wet, dishes might break later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a serene garden scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it’s all heading toward sorrowful mishap.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a deep sadness watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
